meanings.definition: A unit of power equal to one billionth of a watt.
meanings.sent1: The tiny device only required a few abwatts to operate efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the energy consumption in abwatts to understand the power usage.
meanings.sent3: The abwatts in the battery were so minuscule that they could power a tiny LED for days.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like abwatts, quietly powering her through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The abwatts of sunlight filtering through the leaves created a beautiful dappled effect on the ground.

meanings.definition: The measurement of power in a system.
meanings.sent1: The engineer checked the abwatts to ensure the system was running efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The abwatts displayed on the screen indicated a stable power output.
meanings.sent3: The abwatts reading on the meter made the technician do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, abwatts are the currency of efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The abwatts flowing through the circuit were like a gentle stream, powering the entire network.
